title: Tangled Chords
description: What's past is past!Xavier Bell, the poor ugly duckling, has emerged into a rich handsome swan. He is tired of the fast paced life that his hugely successful business afforded him and is looking to return to and settle down in his native Jamaica when he has a chance encounter with his old crush, hotel heiress, Farrah Knight.Farrah is about to marry Jason Cavendish, the man her father chose for her. Can Xavier forget how she had cruelly rejected him when he was poor and not looking so fine and pursue the yearning his heart had for her?
author: Brenda Barrett
